content.article_body: NAWABSHAH, Oct 10 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari Thursday visited mausoleum of his parents in Baloo Ja Qubaa here. He laid flowers on the graves of his parents and offered Fateha. The President was accompanied by provincial ministers including Sindh Home Minister Zia-ul-Hassan Lanjar, Prisons Minister Haji Ali Hassan Zardari and Balochistan Minister Mir Ali Hassan Brohi.
